import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import products from '../products' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import Rating from '../components/Rating' export default function ProductPage() { const { id } = useParams(); const product = products.find((p) => p._id == id) return (
Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: Rs.{product.price} Description: Rs.{product.price}
) }
